channel.title: Really dumb question :s
channel.description: I notice that many people have been giving out only source downloads and they say to use my own client download for the servers client but I don't really understand how i can make a client for the source the only thing i'm thinking i should do is jar the source with another servers client but idk if that would work. I'm sorry I'm just like really new to rsps's if you could explain to me what I need to do tell me in a comment or add me on skype my skype is Levyys25

item.title: Really dumb question :s

The fook did I just read? O_O

item.title: Really dumb question :s
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“levyys, post:7, topic:547111”]But how would you play the server without the source (sorry if im not making sense just really new to this)[/quote]you have the 06scape source? Run that source and use delta scape client.

Read full topic

item.title: Really dumb question :s
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“levyys, post:5, topic:547111”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=666010.msg4452601#msg4452601 date=1412565663]

No I just want to know what i have to do when i download a rsps’s source but the client is not included like do i use another servers client? and if so how do i use another sources client with it
[/quote]Typically sources you download are based off of another base source. Normally the most common source being released at this moment is Project Insanity. So most common type of client will be any renamed project insanity client. If the base server is a delta, use a delta client and so on.

If this isn’t clear don’t hesitate to ask more on this thread.

Thanks for replying to my thread, i’m actually using deltascape client right now and i want to use maybe a 2006scape source or something like that how do i get the deltascape source to work with the 2006scape source?[/quote]You don’t need another source, you just need a delta client presumably from what you have told ne.

Read full topic

item.title: Really dumb question :s
item.dc:creator: @levyys levyys
item.description:
@levyys wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:4, topic:547111”][quote author=levyys link=topic=666010.msg4452576#msg4452576 date=1412545080]
No I just want to know what i have to do when i download a rsps’s source but the client is not included like do i use another servers client? and if so how do i use another sources client with it
[/quote]Typically sources you download are based off of another base source. Normally the most common source being released at this moment is Project Insanity. So most common type of client will be any renamed project insanity client. If the base server is a delta, use a delta client and so on.

If this isn’t clear don’t hesitate to ask more on this thread.[/quote]

Thanks for replying to my thread, i’m actually using deltascape client right now and i want to use maybe a 2006scape source or something like that how do i get the deltascape source to work with the 2006scape source?

Read full topic

item.title: Really dumb question :s
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“levyys, post:3, topic:547111”]No I just want to know what i have to do when i download a rsps’s source but the client is not included like do i use another servers client? and if so how do i use another sources client with it[/quote]Typically sources you download are based off of another base source. Normally the most common source being released at this moment is Project Insanity. So most common type of client will be any renamed project insanity client. If the base server is a delta, use a delta client and so on.

If this isn’t clear don’t hesitate to ask more on this thread.

Read full topic
